__e: This is a cantonment under military discipline... and I wish that you and the child would keep to your own quarters.
You have just seen firsthand what happens when military discipline breaks down.
You're to do what I say to maintain military discipline.
All 14 of you men have been through 120 days of hard work, discipline and commitment.
You have your Law and Order. I have my principles
I can't believe that you're in charge of discipline,and you'll do nothing to stop this.
There are many people, not all I am like my father.
But that's part of the discipline of someone who's the best in the world at what they do.
Maybe it's my military background or my father's strong discipline, -
There's another discipline in the North, but in Rome we go past it, we forgive.
And for that reason you have to have great discipline in what you do.
But discipline in a hospital is a matter of life and death.
I don't expect you to have the discipline to drag yourself out of Carter's bed at 5:30.
